title: (x) Miami font. slanted letters is the best way I can describe it - similar to ITC Avant Garde Gothic alternates {Tom L}
content:
[http://www.miamiandbeaches.com/Index.asp](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221135741/http:/www.miamiandbeaches.com/Index.asp "http://www.miamiandbeaches.com/Index.asp")  
The Miami Logo font.  
I am trying to find this fonts or fonts similar to it. Also, what would be the proper term for a font that has the letterforms "slanted" like that, I know that it is not an Italic font, but what is it?

Thanks for the help!
author: font fanatic
